name: Powerless
description: An outbreak has turned mankind into walking zombies, will your guns be enough to purge them all or will you be powerless against the zombie horde?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 GHZ or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DX11 compliant Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2.4 GHZ or Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DX11 compliant or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
